description:
Your Technology Tutor Chet Davis teaches you to use the options and settings in Pandora Internet Radio, whether on your desktop or laptop computer, Smart Phone, or your home theater system.  You'll be using Pandora within minutes, even if you're brand new to the free Internet music service -- and if you're a Pandora veteran you'll be surprised how easy it is to customize your own stations.


Chet Davis is an experienced technology teacher who get rave reviews from his learners -- he makes learning complex subjects easy and enjoyable.
title: Pandora Internet Radio: Your Customized Music Experience
